column5: Yes let's do this alot before we transition to the other side
Well thats good news. Im suprised that messed him up so bad because its hard for me to even remember the exspirence.
Wow. That is such a bad situation.
2 bottles is lit
Hbr was always more euphoria than poli, IME
300mg was a good start for me. 450mg pretty good too just more intense
Moral of the story NEVER take LSD or magic mushrooms. Only DMT is ok because if your having a bad time it's doesnt last long enough to do anything stupid like that.
Powder. Robocough is probably the 2nd best.
May Allah have mercy on his soul
May Allah have mercy on his soul
Damn i never really got withdrawals from this stuff. I did 354mg couple weeks ago and it was really weak. Like low 2nd plat for 2 hours then sober.
I probably going to crack and order robocough but we"ll see how long i can last
Same
Same
Looks like Mac Miller
It depends how long/much you use. Im probably going to take a year off because i screwed my tolerance BAD with using daily for like 6 months.
Welcome :) im also on a long break myself right now if that makes you feel any better

2 weeks isnt very long to reset dxm tolerance. Im in the same boat i started on Cs and always found the exspirence on that way more trippy and fun. The visuals were INSANE. You may not want to hear this but you may need 6 months break to get what your looking for. Also try dxm hbr delsym always sucked for me never enjoyed that high very much.
I did one time when i had the magic i was dancing in darkness totally lost connection to the physical
For a cheaper cost of living and medical marijuana i dont currently have access to
Yeah i cant wait to move out there
Then what is?
Nobody wants to pay for that
WTF
Try the lower plats for gaming
It's fun. I used to drive around racing games aimlessly having a blast
Dex tolerance sucks because once youve got it its not going anywhere. Im quitting for like a year. I did 354mg the other day and got low 2nd plat for like 2 hours and that was it....
Your gonna need 6 months or more to really make a difference
Use a torch for better results and dont put the flame directly on the bowl
Your lookin pretty hot
Yeah for sure. I wish i had some robo all i had tonight was 1 bottle of assured tussin
Not at all. This is why i switched to syrup
Those mental wards really suck but if you gotta do it then do what you gotta do
Taking 354 mg tonight
I just bought it along with milk hoping to get to get mid 2nd plat
Thats fucked up
Nice relief
Likewise
Grape was better for me
Jesus thats alot of of syrup good luck keeping that down
I didn't know that.

Extractions can only work with poli i dont care for that kind as many others dont and many still get sick on robocough thats another problem with this stuff you can do everything right and still get sick as a dog
All i had was beer and didn't help for shit
Yeah you sound exspirenced you should be alright. My comedown was so strong I promised myself i would never touch this stuff again
It took me 2 days to feel normal after my last hit, but your exspirence might be different

My comedown was really shit for that binge lasted 2 days after i had used for 2 days. There isnt a withdrawal just a comedown period. 2 days isnt enough for major damage but if you keep using you will cause major damage. Thank god i quit.
Its the ROA that gives it a bad rap. Chugging syrup or swallowing 60 gel cap doesnt exactly seem appealing.
Relapsed myself 3 days ago. But im back on track now with recovery. Thats the good thing once you toss the dope your back in recovey.
This isn't a recovery page....
Im just gonna drop the stuff. Im ok with just occasional drinking and weed.
And they looked good to me and hit hard but all meth has affected me in that way
I did maybe .3 last time and 15 times give or take over the last 2 years though most of that use happened in the last year

Meth is a bad decision i bought a bag the other day didnt even finish it. The comedown was too shitty but maybe you dont get those... It will still fry your dopamine receptors leading to a hard time finding happiness sober. I did it like 15 times dont notice anything different but im never gonna use again.
Us going to the moon is debatable... But thanks I guess?
Native American would be my guess
Yeah once you get through the comedown its basically a mental thing after that. Caught up on some good sleep im not 100% but feeling better
Fuck im on day 2 i feel like shit

Thats crazy you went that far with no exspirence. Im currently on 2 days no sleep and feel like utter shit. After a certain point of smoking i stop getting the rush and euphoria it turns into a nasty tweeked out feeling no way i could of used like that i guess we're just wired different because that would of been utter hell for me
Yeah i deleted all my connects. Ive come to the realization for one good thing using gives you it takes away like 20 things in return. Total shit trade.
Congrats on quitting. An 8 ball in one night is mad hardcore and impressive i have to say. How was the comedown from that amount? If i do like .3 I feel like death comingdown
Congrats on quitting. An 8 ball in one night is mad hardcore and impressive i have to say. How was the comedown from that amount? If i do like .3 I feel like death comingdown
Im still drinking but with caution for reasons you mentioned. I trashed my pipe and product and have no regets. Deleted my dealers number too.
I acually went ahead and tossed the dope and pipe. I want nothing to do with this shit anymore.

I completely relate to it being very hard not to overdo it. When i was smoking a couple nights ago i kept loading the bowl even when i didnt need to it was as if the drug took control and was making my decisions thats why im getting the hell off this stuff
I took 100 of those pills (wal tussin) before some how didnt throw up. Though I'm sure if I took any amount today i would puke
The reason i quit this drug. Shame as it was my favorite high out of anything I've taken. Plus no comedown!

Glad you got through it. Im trying to focus on the negatives of using like the wieght loss, lack of sleep, shitty comedowns to not associate any good feelings with this drug. What this drug gives you in return for what you pay is a shitty deal IMO
Thanks for the pointers. Very well said.

Thank you. I picked this drug up again after not using it for many months. Thats seems to be were i slip up. I get a few months clean time and convince myslelf i can go do blast. Not letting that happen this time.
Yeah still sippin on a beer right now gotta walk to the store to get food. Now im trying to quit meth...
Its cheap here because the government wants everyone fucking thier lives up on it
Oh yeah... Saftey first!

I love MDMA never even had bad comedown on that stuff. GHB Sounds really nice if you dose it right. I did too much crystal last night fucked up my exspirence..... So im about to do less right now and see how it goes 😝

Never done GHB, sounds like a intresting substance. Im sure you guys have access to as your close to Canada and i know they've got it. Hell i would exspirence it for the hell of it. You only live once, mind as well enjoy whats out there!

Gays use meth and MUCH higher rates than other groups no secret there... As far as scoring goes the gay clubs could be a hotspot. Hell im sure there's dope in the club's ready to be sold... But thats just the kinda place NYC is
I know i can, i can rack up loads of clean time but the fucked up part about this drug i can go like 4 months without touching it but i always come back craving this shit... Fuck.....

Oh yes. It takes time to get your skills working the pipe but i think that on its own get people hooked...in my exspirence you have to wait untill you smoke it to know what your working with, as all the crystal i have done looks IDENTICAL, yet some bags are stronger than others. As far as risking freedom thats why i just buy small bags (maybe a 20 sack) so if i do get busted its not gonna be a big deal.
Nice. I'll have to look into that. I also got a little carried away on the pipe last night taking way more hits than i needed resulting in harsher comedown.
Tennessee over here. Its ok I'm doing better than earlier 👍
Welcome. Wish i had a bar right now. Using beer to come down from crystal i smoked but bar would better
Very wise words
Just had a few beer to cure my comedown from last nights sesh.... Party hard
Hell yeah. I would gladly pay more for better shit. I just have to pace myself better next time. Because smoking too much fucks the high up IMO
Alot of it is connections I've heard of people scoring balls for 80 around here you just have to "know the guy"
I prefer smoking out of a bubble personally
I think 40 for half G 70 for G Of good shit is average pricing in mine
Not that hairy
Yes it looked very pure but i think the trick to avoiding a shitty comedown is only take like 2 or 3 hits i got so caught up in the rush i was loading bowl after bowl
It was good. Amazing rush (im a smoker) and real clean burn in the bowl. I took too many hits though i should of stopped after 2 or 3
Fuck same situation im in exsept I did meth
No reason**

Im gonna wait a couple month too before i use again. The comedown and lack of appitate put me off this drug so much... Not to mention if you get busted its a serious offence. Ive got reason to buy this drug again and i really hope i dont
Ive got like .2 left when that is gone im quitting this shit.
True but i got carried away and smoked too much last night my high was way too tweaky and this comedown is kicking my ass 😒
